text: Tumi, Capernaum, tumikhan ke sorgo uporte uthibole nadibo, na uthibo dibo? Tumikhan ke Hades te namai dibo. Kilekoile tumikhan ke koi diya nisena jodi Sodom11.23 Sodom to bisi paapi sheher ekta thakisele aru Isor pora etu ke khotom kori dise, Gen. 19: 24-29. te bhi asurit aru dangor kaam korise koile, taikhan aji bachikena thakibo thakise.
